title: The triall of vvitch-craft shewing the true and right methode of the discouery: with a confutation of erroneous wayes. By Iohn Cotta, Doctor in Physicke.
author: Cotta, John, 1575?-1650?
publisher: Printed by I[ohn] L[egat] for Richard Higgenbotham, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Angel in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: Running title reads: The triall of witch-craft, with the true discouerie thereof.
This copy has added title page of STC 5837: The infallible true and assured vvitch: or, the second edition, of The tryall of witch-craft.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
